elements.name: Login Waste Permits Backend

steps.name: the CRM application has been launched
I am on the CRM login page

elements.name: Login Waste Permits Frontend

steps.name: the application has been launched

elements.name: As a user when I click on the Upload technical management qualifications page, then the Technical qualifications selection page should be displayed

steps.name: the application has been launched
I am on the "Apply for a mobile plant standard rules waste permit" page
I click on "Continue" button
I am on the "Select a permit" page
I select a permit "SR2010-No-4"
I click on "Continue" button
I am on the Task list page
I click on the "Upload technical management qualifications" link
I am on the "Who will provide technical management on your site?" page

cells: Registered on a course - grace period

steps.name: following are the options on the the technical qualifications page:

elements.name: As a user when I click on the options on the Upload technical management qualifications page, then the respective upload documents page should be displayed

steps.name: the application has been launched
I am on the "Apply for a mobile plant standard rules waste permit" page
I click on "Continue" button
I am on the "Select a permit" page
I select a permit "SR2010-No-4"
I click on "Continue" button
I am on the Task list page
I click on the "Upload technical management qualifications" link
I am on the "Who will provide technical management on your site?" page

cells: Registered on a course - grace period

steps.name: following are the options on the the technical qualifications page:
I click on "WAMITAB qualification" on the Upload technical management qualifications page
I click on "Continue" button
I am on the "Upload the WAMITAB certificate" page
I click back
I am on the "Who will provide technical management on your site?" page
I click on "Registered on a course - grace period" on the Upload technical management qualifications page
I click on "Continue" button
I am on the "Upload the course registration email or letter" page
I click back
I am on the "Who will provide technical management on your site?" page
I click on "Deemed competence" on the Upload technical management qualifications page
I click on "Continue" button
I am on the "Upload evidence of their qualification" page
I click back
I am on the "Who will provide technical management on your site?" page
I click on "ESA/EU skills" on the Upload technical management qualifications page
I click on "Continue" button
I am on the "Upload the ESA EU Skills scheme certificate" page
I click back
I am on the "Who will provide technical management on your site?" page

elements.name: As a user, I should be able to upload technical documents for the technical competencies
